01. La Lagartija

Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for the start of ypur journey! It will provide you a rich delicious flavor.

Roasting: 5/10
Intensity: 6/10

02. El Tigre

Really dark coffee, only for the real gourmets. It has bitter flavor of grapefruits and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts with caramel.

Roasting: 8/10
Intensity: 9/10

03. La Cucaracha

Sweet and intense with a bg amount of different flavors. Caramel, grapes, strawberry, you name it! It's great choice for warm summer days.

Roasting: 3/10
Intensity: 7/10

About Us

Who are we? Just a bunch of friends with a love for a good coffee and a desire to create something new, something original.

Our coffee reflects us - young, wild, and free. We are on the journey of new tastes...
